overview: Through an intimate conversation, Steph Jane, age 28, shares the struggles and lessons her second diagnosis of stage-4 cancer has taught her. From being genuinely present and savouring simple moments to thoughts of the future and what really matters, Steph reveals beauty and wisdom which transcend appearance and years.
tagline: After a second diagnosis of stage 4 cancer, ceramic artist Steph Jane, age 28, shares the complexity and clarity it brings to her life.
title: Steph Jane - A Portrait Story
